LanguageData.RT_M113M_APC_Blueprint.label: M125
LanguageData.RT_M113M_APC_Blueprint.description:
A mortar variant of the M113 APC, capable of both infantry transport and artillery support; common to see in foreign military trade worldwide. Armed with a 81 mm self-propelled mortar and a 7.62 mm machine gun.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Mortar Gunner x2,Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
81mm Mortar shell（Main cannon）
.50 BMG（Support MG）
